00094 class CPixelGroup {
00095         public: // attributes
00096         private: // attributes
00097                 TPixelGroup* m_pGroup;
00098                 bool m_OwnGroup; // if true, the class contains its own TPixelGroup and must
00099                                                 // remember to deallocate the memory when destructing
00100         public: // methods
00102                 CPixelGroup();
00109                 CPixelGroup(unsigned int InitialSize, bool AllocateColors=false);
00110                 // constructor which takes an external TGroup as reference to data,
00111                 // in this case, the class does not deallocate memory for the TPixelGroup pointet
00112                 // to by m_pGroup.
00113                 CPixelGroup(TPixelGroup& TGroup);
00116                 CPixelGroup(const CPixelGroup& SourceGroup);
00119                 CPixelGroup& operator=(const CPixelGroup& SourceGroup);

00127                 ~CPixelGroup();
00129                 void Empty();
00136                 typedef CPixelGroupIterator Iterator;
00143                 typedef CPixelGroupConstIterator ConstIterator;
00146                 inline Iterator End(){return Iterator(m_pGroup->pPos+m_pGroup->NumberOfPixels);}
00149                 inline Iterator Begin(){return Iterator(m_pGroup->pPos);}

00488 
00489 inline T2DInt CPixelGroup::operator[](unsigned int Index)
00490 {
00491         return m_pGroup->pPos[Index];
00492 }
00493 
00494 inline unsigned int CPixelGroup::GetTotalPositions() const
00495 {
00496         return m_pGroup->NumberOfPixels;
00497 }
00498 
00499 inline unsigned int CPixelGroup::GetWidth() const
00500 {
00501         return m_pGroup->Right.x-m_pGroup->Left.x+1;
00502 }
00503 
00504 inline unsigned int CPixelGroup::GetHeight() const
00505 {
00506         return m_pGroup->Bottom.y-m_pGroup->Top.y+1;
00507 }
00508 
00509 inline CPoint2D<INT16> CPixelGroup::GetPosition(unsigned int Index) const
00510 {
00511         if (Index<m_pGroup->NumberOfPixels)
00512                 return CPoint2D<INT16>(m_pGroup->pPos[Index].x,m_pGroup->pPos[Index].y);
00513         else
00514         {
00515                 ostringstream ost;
00516                 ost << "CPixelGroup::GetPosition() Index(" << Index << ") out of range" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00517                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00518                 return CPoint2D<INT16>(0,0);
00519         }
00520 }
00521 
00522 inline UINT32 CPixelGroup::GetColor(unsigned int Index) const
00523 {
00524         if ((m_pGroup->pColor!=NULL) && (Index<m_pGroup->NumberOfPixels))
00525                 return m_pGroup->pColor[Index];
00526         else
00527         {
00528                 ostringstream ost;
00529                 ost << "CPixelGroup::GetColor() Index(" << Index << ") out of range or colors not available" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00530                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00531                 return 0;
00532         }
00533 }
00534 
00535 inline bool CPixelGroup::SetColor(UINT32 ColorValue, unsigned int Index)
00536 {
00537         if ((m_pGroup->pColor!=NULL) && (Index<m_pGroup->NumberOfPixels))
00538         {
00539                 m_pGroup->pColor[Index]=ColorValue;
00540                 return true;
00541         }
00542         else
00543         {
00544                 ostringstream ost;
00545                 ost << "CPixelGroup::SetColor() Index(" << Index << ") out of range or colors not available" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00546                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00547                 return false;
00548         }
00549 }
00550 
00551 inline bool CPixelGroup::AddPosition(INT16 x, INT16 y)
00552 {
00553         if (k_AddPosToGroup(x,y,m_pGroup)!=true)
00554         {
00555                 ostringstream ost;
00556                 ost << "CPixelGroup::AddPosition() Colors available, cannot insert position only" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00557                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00558                 return false;
00559         }
00560         else
00561                 return true;
00562 }
00563 
00564 inline bool CPixelGroup::AddPosition(const CPoint2D<INT16>& Pos)
00565 {
00566         if (k_AddPosToGroup(Pos.GetX(),Pos.GetY(),m_pGroup)!=true)
00567         {
00568                 ostringstream ost;
00569                 ost << "CPixelGroup::AddPosition() Colors available, cannot insert position only" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00570                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00571                 return false;
00572         }
00573         else
00574                 return true;    
00575 }
00576 
00577 inline bool CPixelGroup::AddPositionColor(INT16 x, INT16 y, UINT32 Color)
00578 {
00579         if (k_AddPosColorToGroup(x,y,Color,m_pGroup)!=true)
00580         {
00581                 ostringstream ost;
00582                 ost << "CPixelGroup::AddPositionColor() Colors not available" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00583                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00584                 return false;
00585         }
00586         else
00587                 return true;
00588 }
00589 
00590 inline bool CPixelGroup::AddPositionColor(const CPoint2D<INT16>& Pos,UINT32 Color)
00591 {
00592         if (k_AddPosColorToGroup(Pos.GetX(),Pos.GetY(),Color,m_pGroup)!=true)
00593         {
00594                 ostringstream ost;
00595                 ost << "CPixelGroup::AddPositionColor() Colors not available" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00596                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00597                 return false;
00598         }
00599         else
00600                 return true;
00601 }

00604 {
00605         return k_RemovePosFromGroupFast(Index,m_pGroup);
00606 }
